# birddog

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `birddog` is sniffing out new patterns in scientific and patent literature.

## Installation

You can install the development version of `birddog` from [GitHub](https://github.com/roneyfraga/birddog) with:

```{r eval = F}
# install.packages("devtools")
library(devtools)

# install and load getLattes
devtools::install_github("roneyfraga/birddog")
library(birddog)
```

To more details see:

```{r eval = F}
vignette("introduction_birddog", package = "birddog")
```
